history.proof: intros A B T f F. qsimpl time: 1 use: Included,IndexedUnion. intros x Hx. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: indexed_union_intro, Included, IndexedUnion.

ctx: intros A B T f F.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce IndexedUnion to an evaluable reference.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B T : Type) (f : A -> B) (F : IndexedFamily B T), let subF := fun a : A => F (f a) in Included (IndexedUnion subF) (IndexedUnion F)

Premises:
IndexedUnion : forall A T : Type, IndexedFamily A T -> Ensemble T
IndexedFamily = fun A T : Type => A -> Ensemble T : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments IndexedFamily (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
ClassicalFacts.F : forall A : Prop, ClassicalFacts.has_fixpoint A -> (A -> A) -> A
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In B x -> In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Included {U}%type_scope
indexed_union_intro : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> In (IndexedUnion F) x
indexed_intersection_intro : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (x : T), (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> In (IndexedIntersection F) x
IndexedUnion_ind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedUnion F t -> P t
IndexedUnion_sind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedUnion F t -> P t
IndexedIntersection_ind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedIntersection F t -> P t
IndexedIntersection_sind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedIntersection F t -> P t
Inductive IndexedIntersection (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) : Ensemble T := indexed_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> In (IndexedIntersection F) x Arguments IndexedIntersection [A T]%type_scope Arguments indexed_intersection_intro [A T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
subfamily_intersection : forall (T : Type) (F G : Family T), Included F G -> Included (FamilyIntersection G) (FamilyIntersection F)
subfamily_union : forall (T : Type) (F G : Family T), Included F G -> Included (FamilyUnion F) (FamilyUnion G)
Inductive FamilyUnion (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_union_intro : forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x Arguments FamilyUnion [T]%type_scope Arguments family_union_intro [T]%type_scope
family_union_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x
family_intersection_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (x : T), (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x
Setminus_intro : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), In A x -> ~ In B x -> In (Setminus A B) x
Union_absorbs : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included B A -> Union A B = A
FamilyUnion_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
FamilyUnion_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
Union_add : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), Add (Union A B) x = Union A (Add B x)
Distributivity : forall (U : Type) (A B C : Ensemble U), Intersection A (Union B C) = Union (Intersection A B) (Intersection A C)
Distributivity' : forall (U : Type) (A B C : Ensemble U), Union A (Intersection B C) = Intersection (Union A B) (Union A C)
Union_associative : forall (U : Type) (A B C : Ensemble U), Union (Union A B) C = Union A (Union B C)
incl_add : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), Included A B -> Included (Add A x) (Add B x)
incl_add_x : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), ~ In A x -> Included (Add A x) (Add B x) -> Included A B
Distributivity_l : forall (U : Type) (A B C : Ensemble U), Intersection (Union A B) C = Union (Intersection A C) (Intersection B C)
Inductive FamilyIntersection (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x Arguments FamilyIntersection [T]%type_scope Arguments family_intersection_intro [T]%type_scope _ [x] _%function_scope
Add_covers : forall (U : Type) (A a : Ensemble U), Included a A -> forall x : U, In A x -> ~ In a x -> covers (Ensemble U) (Power_set_PO U A) (Add a x) a

```coq
intros A B T f F.
unfold Included, IndexedUnion.
intros x Hx.
rewrite <- (indexed_union_intro _ _ (f _) _ Hx).
apply indexed_union_intro.
Qed.```

original: intros A B T f F. unfold Included, IndexedUnion. intros x Hx. rewrite <- (indexed_union_intro _ _ (f _) _ Hx). apply indexed_union_intro.
